description:
A little bit retro and a little bit now, the Newport blends hoodie comfort with ‘90s rugby jersey styling.Snap-down front plackets and single chest pocket.Piping at the wrists and hem help keep the warmth in.Picture was established with the goal of creating inspiring outdoor clothing that helps us reduce our dependence on fossil fuels. Picture believes in 100% transparency and uses factories that are part of the Fair Wear Foundation.

        Sustainability








Organic








                      Organically grown content














                      Recycled content
name: Picture Newport Hoodie - Men's
